#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define llu long long int
llu a[3],i,nb,ns,nc,pb,ps,pc,r,nh,ch,c;
string s;
int main()
{
    cin>>a[0]>>a[1]>>a[2];
    cin>>nb>>ns>>nc;
    cin>>pb>>ps>>pc;
    cin>>r;
    ch=pb*a[0]+ps*a[1]+pc*a[2];
    llu ans=0;
    for(i=0;i<=100;i++)
    {
        llu p=0;
        p+=((a[0]*i<nb)?0:a[0]*i-nb)*pb;
        p+=((a[1]*i<ns)?0:a[1]*i-ns)*ps;
        p+=((a[2]*i<nc)?0:a[2]*i-nc)*pc;
        if(r>=p)ans=max(ans,i+(r-p)/ch);
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}
